x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Checklist is not available on work orders created by rounds, scheduled maintenance.
Steps to Execute:
Create a round with a pre-checklist and no working checklist.
Create the stops and execute the rounds.
Navigate to the newly created work order.
Expected Result: User should see the pre checklist button.
Actual Result: Pre checklist button not available on the work order created by rounds.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Checklist not available
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation:
There is an Update Set provided by the Product team to Fix this issue.
Apply Update Set : ChecklistRulesFix
